CustomField.description: this field is derived using service date and if service date is missing then considered close date.
CustomField.formula: IF( MONTH(IF(ISNULL(ServiceDate), Opportunity.CloseDate,ServiceDate)) < 10, '0'&TEXT(MONTH(IF(ISNULL(ServiceDate), Opportunity.CloseDate,ServiceDate))), TEXT(MONTH(IF(ISNULL(ServiceDate), Opportunity.CloseDate,ServiceDate))) ) &' - '& TEXT(YEAR (IF(ISNULL(ServiceDate), Opportunity.CloseDate,ServiceDate)))
CustomField.label: Sales Month/Year
